agent_card.name: Transcriptor
agent_card.description: An agent that transcribes audio files into text. It supports various audio formats and can handle long audio files by splitting them into manageable segments.

skills.name: Transcribe Audio
skills.description: Transcribes audio files into text. The agent can handle various audio formats and long audio files by splitting them into segments.
examples: Transcribe this audio file into text.
Convert the speech in this audio file to text.
